mapper.select: WITH Filtered AS ( SELECT NEED_RQISIT_CD, NEED_RQISIT_NM, NEED_RQISIT_FG, ACLF_NO , VER_CD , AELM_CD , PCFM_CD FROM HR_JOBDIVBASE_SDTL WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{COMPANY_CD} AND ACLF_NO = #{ACLF_NO} AND VER_CD = #{VER_CD} AND AELM_CD = #{AELM_CD} AND PCFM_CD = #{PCFM_CD} ) SELECT a.NEED_RQISIT_CD, a.NEED_RQISIT_NM AS NEED_RQISIT_NM1, b.NEED_RQISIT_NM AS NEED_RQISIT_NM2, c.NEED_RQISIT_NM AS NEED_RQISIT_NM3, a.ACLF_NO , a.VER_CD , a.AELM_CD , a.PCFM_CD FROM (SELECT ACLF_NO, VER_CD, AELM_CD ,PCFM_CD ,NEED_RQISIT_CD, NEED_RQISIT_NM FROM Filtered WHERE NEED_RQISIT_FG = 1) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT NEED_RQISIT_CD, NEED_RQISIT_NM FROM Filtered WHERE NEED_RQISIT_FG = 2) b ON a.NEED_RQISIT_CD = b.NEED_RQISIT_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT NEED_RQISIT_CD, NEED_RQISIT_NM FROM Filtered WHERE NEED_RQISIT_FG = 3) c ON a.NEED_RQISIT_CD = c.NEED_RQISIT_CD ORDER BY NEED_RQISIT_CD
